CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 24, 1951, pg. 6, reads: "Tyson's Bakery Employes [Employees] - This staff of pleasant workers helped the 3,500 persons tour the remodeled bakery during the week-end. Left to right, they are Miss Martha Tyson, the proprietor, Mrs. Helen Howard, Miss Bessie Isborne, Mrs. Mattie Rockamore, Noah Tyson, the proprietor's brother, Pearl Woods, Mrs. Lorene Lee and Miss Penelope Tyson who is not in picture.  The gala opening attracted the largest crowds in recent history. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Tyson's Bakery employees, including left to right: proprietor Martha Tyson, Helen Howard, Bessie Isborne, Mattie Rockamore, Noah Tyson, Pearl Woods, and Lorene Lee, posed with floral arrangements after bakery remodeling, 2149 Centre Avenue
